name: legend-item
description: The oj-c-legend-item element is used to declare properties for legend items.

categories.description: An array of categories for the legend item. Legend items currently only support a single category.

symbolType.description: The type of legend symbol to display.

line.description: The legend symbol will be a line.

lineWithMarker.description: The legend symbol will be a line and a marker.

image.description: The legend symbol will be an image.

marker.description: The legend symbol will be a marker.

source.description: The URI of the image of the legend symbol.

color.description: The color of the legend symbol (line or marker). When symbolType is "lineWithMarker", this attribute defines the line color and the markerColor attribute defines the marker color.

borderColor.description: The border color of the marker. Only applies if symbolType is "marker" or "lineWithMarker.

lineStyle.description: The line style. Only applies when the symbolType is "line" or "lineWithMarker".

solid.description: Line will have a solid stroke.

lineWidth.description: The line width in pixels. Only applies when the symbolType is "line" or "lineWithMarker.

markerShape.description: The shape of the marker. Only applies if symbolType is "marker" or "lineWithMarker". Does not apply if a custom image is specified.

circle.description: The marker will be of circular shape.

diamond.description: The marker will be of diamond shape.

ellipse.description: The marker will be of ellipse shape.

human.description: The marker will be of human shape.

plus.description: The marker will be of plus shape.

rectangle.description: The marker will be of rectangular shape.

square.description: The marker will be of square shape.

star.description: The marker will be of star shape.

triangleDown.description: The  marker will be of triangular shape facing down.

triangleUp.description: The  marker will be of triangular shape facing up.

markerColor.description: The color of the marker, if different than the line color. Only applies if the symbolType is "lineWithMarker".

shortDesc.description: The description of this legend item. This is used for accessibility and for customizing the tooltip text.

drilling.description: Whether drilling is enabled on the legend item.

inherit.description: The drilling behavior is inherited from legend.

off.description: The legend item will not be drillable.

on.description: The legend item will be drillable.

setProperty.description: Sets a property or a single subproperty for complex properties and notifies the component of the change, triggering a corresponding event.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to set. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

params.name: value
params.description: The new value to set the property to.

getProperty.description: Retrieves the value of a property or a subproperty.

params.name: property
params.description: The property name to get. Supports dot notation for subproperty access.

setProperties.description: Performs a batch set of properties.

params.name: properties
params.description: An object containing the property and value pairs to set.
